alert.note: Alert for Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gilmer, southern Murray, Gordon and northwestern Pickens Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 804 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Audubon, or 7 miles northeast of Calhoun, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent lightning, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Calhoun, Resaca, Plainville, Fairmount, Ranger, Carters, Sonoraville, Ramhurst, Oostanaula, Redbud, Audubon, Blaine, Sugar Valley, Oakman, Nickelsville and Hinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
